attributes.action: GB Winter Olympics athletes to wear LGBT rainbow kit in Russia in 2014.
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned people of Britain, would like our athletes - at the Winter Olympics in Russia in 2014 - to make a positive, peaceful message in support of universal acceptance and understanding towards homosexuality. We ask that they wear the colours of the LGBT rainbow flag when competing, in support of people persecuted worldwide. We petition the Right Honourable Hugh Robertson MP (Minister for Sport) to encourage the British Olympic Association to take this action to make us proud.

rejection.details: One for the BOA to decide.
